title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the label height remains the same and does not adjust according to the new font size.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately. The label height remains the same and does not adjust according to the new font size.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label height should adjust accordingly to match the new font size.
SR:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Verify that the label height adjusts to match the new font size.
